ABOUT

The UNCUFFED: product of grace is a Worship + Word conference, happening LIVE in Winnipeg.

This theme is drawn from the fact that God has set us free from the cuffs and shackles of sin and our old identity that once held us bound. And we, now free people, recognize that this freedom has come only as a product of Godâ€™s grace.

It promises to be an amazing time of worship and the Word, as we would be receiving the ministry of Apostle Bryan Meadows, from Embassy City in Atlanta. Ministering in song is Tim Reddick from DC, and two-time Grammy & Juno- Nominated Artist, Fresh IE.
